site.description: ZeroNET ANN     ZeroNet Coin - ZNT **News** ZeroNet is now listed on Coinsmarkets!  https://coinsmarkets.com/trade-BTC-ZNT.htm What is ZeroNet? ZeroNet is for creating Open, Free and uncensorable websites, using Bitcoin cryptography and BitTorrent network. Your content distributed directly to other visitors without any central server. ZeroNet Website: https://zeronet.io/ ZeroNet Software Windows: [1] ZeroNet Other OS (Linux, Mac): [1] ZeroNet Source: [1] Wallet software ZeroNet Coin is a mineable currency, based on Bitcoin's SHA256 algorithm, the same Bitcoin encryption used by ZeroNet. Windows Wallet: [1][2] Linux Wallet: [1][2] Source: [1][2] Github: [1] ZeroNet ANN Hash Bounty: 1,000 ZNT coins. 1) Download ZeroNet Software at https://zeronet.io/ 2) Create Website ZeroNet Hash 3) Copy/Paste this ZeroNet ANN 4) Seed. 5) Your "Page Address" After you created Website = ZeroNet Hash 6) PM me ZeroNet Hash to Receive Bounty (You need to seed first before bounty released). You must download the wallet, open it and then close it.    2. Go to your %appdata% folder (just type %appdata% into the Windows Explorer address bar)(/home/username/.zeronet/zeronet.conf for Linux)    2. Create file called zeronet.conf    4. Open the zeronet.conf file with Notepad and copy&paste the nodes(below) into the file. Code: addnode=45.55.146.128 addnode=24.70.209.174 addnode=107.191.55.64 addnode=37.97.242.80 addnode=142.177.219.171 addnode=84.227.97.53 addnode=90.150.22.79 addnode=75.109.15.26 addnode=88.164.70.252 addnode=92.211.192.25   5.
